name: Magic hat (Eskymak)
description:
Magicians have complete control over what they're doing.

Have you ever wondered how magicians are always able to take the right thing out of the magic hat? 

Well... that doesn't apply here. Work with the tools whichever your magic hat gives you!

Cards!

Enldess  scarf

Ball

Bouncy ball?

Though sometimes your Magic hat throws things at its own will. Be careful!

WSD - movement

Mouse - aim

Left click - shoot

Jump to "catch" them as well!

R - reload, if you fall

Left click hold - sLAp your Magic hat

Magicians have more Aces up their sleeves and they don't tell to anyone... of course

Browser version has laggy background music  :-(  Turn down volume!

Well... it's laggy overall :C

Download recommended!!

if it gets laggy turn it off and then on

sorry for the inconveniences  ; ;

submission for  2020 GMTK  Jam

Michael - Programming, Game Desing

Larin  - Art, Game Design, Sound
